remarks: The existence of an indexed union. ` x ` is normally a free-variable parameter in the class expression substituted for ` B ` , which can be read informally as ` B ( x ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2003.)
statement:
iunex.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
iunex.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
iunex $p |- U_ x e. A B e. _V $.
$d A x $.
